Articles.Content:
Hi all, so im early into my career and want to go to the Mun, however its not there.  Nor is Minmus - or any other Moon from any other planet!  Im assuming this is caused by a mod.  Can anyone see anything that could cause this?

Mod List:

 Launch Escape System (PEBKACIndustriesLaunchEscapeSystem 1.2.0.1)
6 Crew Science Lab (SixCrewScienceLab 1.1)
6 Seat Mk3 Cockpit (SixSeatMk3cockpit 1.1)

Remove kopernicus,  ModularFlightIntegrator and whatever planet pack you have and see if the problem persists 

Edited November 11, 2016 by Galileo

Removing Kopernicus resolved this - thanks!  And it also brought missing clouds back.

Edited November 11, 2016 by funkcanna

Looks like you don't have a single mod that requires kopernicus. Always make sure you know what mods do what or you will end up with issues and not knowing what is causing them.  It's a known issue that clouds don't show up in the main menu with kopernicus installed. If you actually go in game,  there are clouds.

On 11/11/2016 at 8:04 AM, Galileo said:

 If you actually go in game,  there are clouds. 

There wasnt any clouds in game either!

1 hour ago, funkcanna said:

There wasnt any clouds in game either!

Tbh you have so many mods it could be any of them causing an issue.  My recommendation is to try SVE without any other mods installed. And install it manually, not through CKAN. See if the issue persists. If you get clouds great,  start adding your mods back little by little until you find what mod is conflicting with SVE

3 hours ago, Galileo said:

Tbh you have so many mods it could be any of them causing an issue.  My recommendation is to try SVE without any other mods installed. And install it manually, not through CKAN. See if the issue persists. If you get clouds great,  start adding your mods back little by little until you find what mod is conflicting with SVE

Cool will do, thanks for your help.
Also if experiencing lag or game crashing remove some useless mods.
